page.title: 17Presto's of Dumfries
page.content: The person we interviewed was Mr.Simson who was very kind to give us his time. He said that the spot was a very good spot to build Presto's. He also said that Presto's usd to be across the street. The manager was Mr.Ross but we did not see him. Mr.Simson said that they got about 13-14000 shoppers a week, and he employs about 150 people. We asked Mr.Simson if they got good support from the council. He said yes. We also asked if they got on with the other stores around them. He said yes. He also said they get more trade in the summer because of all the tourists. They send away for food a week in advance. The building was built in 1981-82. It is the third biggest market chain in Britain. The two other shops are Fine Fare and Sainsbury's.
